thread.title: Burglary at Nicki Minaj's Los Angeles Mansion Under Investigation
thread.title_full: Burglary at Nicki Minaj's Los Angeles Mansion Under Investigation

author: NHHMS
title: Burglary at Nicki Minaj's Los Angeles Mansion Under Investigation
text:
http://www.billboard.com/files/styles/promo_225/public/media/Nicki-Minaj-02-MTV-Awards-2016-billboard-1548.jpg 
Evan Agostini/Invision/AP 
Nicki Minaj arrives at the MTV Video Music Awards at Madison Square Garden on Aug. 28, 2016 in New York City. 
A burglary has taken place at Nicki Minaj ‘s Los Angeles mansion where the suspect or suspects made away with approximately $175,000 worth of jewelry and other items, a representative from the Los Angeles Police Department tells Billboard. 
The theft took place at some time between Nov. 24, 2016, and January 2017. The rapper was out of town and the residence was left alone during that time. 
According to TMZ , her 11,500-square-foot home appeared to be trashed, with furniture flipped and certain items, including picture frames and perfume bottles, vandalized. 
There are no suspects as of press time and the robbery is still under investigation. 
Billboard has reached out to Nicki Minaj’s rep for comment. TAGS
